name: @barzhsieh/nuxt-content-mermaid
description: A Nuxt module designed for integrating Mermaid with `@nuxt/content`. It automatically converts `mermaid` code blocks in Markdown into responsive chart components, and supports lazy loading and dark/light theme switching.

scripts.dev: npm run dev:prepare && nuxi dev playground
scripts.dev:prepare: nuxt-module-build build --stub && nuxt-module-build prepare && nuxi prepare playground
scripts.release:base: pnpm run lint && pnpm run test && pnpm run prepack
scripts.release:patch: pnpm run release:base && changelogen --release --patch --push && pnpm publish
scripts.release:minor: pnpm run release:base && changelogen --release --minor --push && pnpm publish
scripts.release:major: pnpm run release:base && changelogen --release --major --push && pnpm publish
